mapper.select: SELECT A.PROCS_ID , A.PROCS_NM , B.CODE_NM PROCS_STTUS , TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREAT_DT , A.MNGR_NM , A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM COMTNPROCESSMON A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM072' AND A.PROCS_STTUS = B.CODE WHERE A.PROCS_NM = #{processNm}

SELECT A.LOG_ID , A.PROCS_ID , A.PROCS_NM , B.CODE_NM PROCS_STTUS , TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREAT_DT , A.LOG_INFO , A.MNGR_NM , A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM COMTNPROCESSMONLOGINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM072' AND A.PROCS_STTUS = B.CODE WHERE A.PROCS_NM = #{processNm} AND A.LOG_ID = #{logId}
